sentences.en: Cases: Prepare your role in Barrister and Avocat, and your role The Yearly Review.
sentences.cn: 个案: 请准备在下周雇用/薪水个案及绩效评估(年度检讨)个案中所欲扮演的角色.

sentences.en: Our case was argued by an able barrister, who reduced the prosecutor's submissions almost to nothing.
sentences.cn: 我们的案子由一位很有能力的律师为我们辩护，他驳得原告的呈辞一无是处。

sentences.en: The barrister entirely renounce his right to object to a juror.
sentences.cn: 这位律师完全放弃了反对陪审团成员的权力。

sentences.en: The link was 19 th century British barrister John MacGregor.
sentences.cn: 将远古的独木舟转化为现代的皮划艇,还要归功于19世纪的英国流浪作家约翰?麦克格里格.

sentences.en: You've wanted to be a barrister since the year dot.
sentences.cn: 很久以前你就一直想成为一名辩护律师了。

words.tran_cn: 律师；（加拿大）出庭律师（等于arrister-at-law）；（英）（有资格出席高等法庭并辩护的）专门律师

trans.tran_cn: 法律顾问，律师，〈英〉（可在高等法院出庭的）大律师，专门律师
trans.tran_en: a lawyer in Britain who can argue cases in the higher law courts
